item.description:
Hello all,

Texas Hold Em Poker Tournament at Tracy and James new place 168 Stratton Brook Rd. Simsbury CT (860) 217-1285. $20.00 buy ins/no rebuys. Tracy will provide dinner, soda and snacks. Please feel free to bring something to share. BYOB. Also bring your favorite board game.

Please note that GPS often brings people to 166 not 168 - look for the pile of logs on the left hand side and you will see the pillars with lights after. There is a split driveway. Bear left up the hill. 

For people that have animal allergies they have a dog.

They also have Kinect, XBOX gaming rock band, Karaoke and a few board games.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Texas Hold Em Poker Tournament at Tracy and James house
